How It Works

Transforming your wheels is easier than you think. Three simple steps to a fresh new look.

01

Design or Upload

Choose from our curated collection of wheel emblem designs or upload your own custom artwork. Our intuitive editor makes it easy to visualize your new look.

02

We Print & Dome

We print your design in 4K resolution and apply a UV-resistant, clear polyurethane resin dome. This creates a stunning 3D effect that is scratch-proof and weatherproof.

03

Peel & Stick

Application is a breeze. Just clean your wheel center cap, peel off the backing, and stick on your new emblem. Our industrial adhesive ensures it stays put.
